text: and with the one lamb a tenth part of an ephah29:40 1 ephah is about 22 liters or about 2/3 of a bushel of fine flour mixed with the fourth part of a hin29:40 A hin is about 6.5 liters or 1.7 gallons, so a fourth of a hin is about 1.6 liters. of beaten oil, and the fourth part of a hin of wine for a drink offering.
